name: Lendas
description:
Brought back to the world of the living, you'll need to survive as you explore stunningly beautiful worlds filled with danger.

What is Lendas?

is a Survival and Exploration game with Action RPG elements. It takes place in procedurally generated worlds with living ecosystems.
Face creatures inspired by the Brazilian folklore and steal their powers to bring you one step closer to your revenge.

You will need to harvest resources, build items, hunt powerful creatures and build shelters that will help you survive.
